sentences.en: But the existence of the woodpecker, definitively seen since the 1940 s , remains highly disputed.
sentences.cn: 但这种啄木鸟自1940年代之后就再无权威的目击记录, 关于它们幸存与否依然存在大量争议.

sentences.en: DNA tests should determine definitively whether the baby was the one Tunstall was carrying, Hart said.
sentences.cn: 哈特表示,DNA检测将最终证实婴儿是否是汤斯顿所怀的婴儿.

sentences.en: Except for a few exceptions which I will discuss later, there are no definitively exterior surfaces.
sentences.cn: 除了我将在下文讨论的一些例外, 并不存在明确无误的外在表面.

sentences.en: Value failure for the fact that It'shows you definitively what will and will not work.
sentences.cn: 要重视失败,因为失败能够让你清楚了解,什么可行、什么不可行.

sentences.en: What we need is a means to objectively evaluate code quality, something that can tell us, definitively, that the code we're looking at is risky.
sentences.cn: 我们需要的是客观评估代码质量的方法，某种可以决定性地告诉我们正在查看的代码是否存在风险的东西。
